title: North Korea talks: what, when and where?
text:
North Korea talks: what, when and where? 10:28am GMT - 01:48 
There's been a whirlwind of speculation surrounding the details of an upcoming potential summit between Kim Jong Un and Donald Trump. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
